body: `THSTensor_(set)` actually clones the given indices and values tensors, so I think that corresponds to the semantics you describe. I'll rename `THSTensor_(set)` to `THSTensor_(_set)` as you suggested (or maybe we should give it a different name entirely, like `copyInto`)
body_html: THSTensor_(set) actually clones the given indices and values tensors, so I think that corresponds to the semantics you describe. I'll rename THSTensor_(set) to THSTensor_(_set) as you suggested (or maybe we should give it a different name entirely, like copyInto)
